resources.string: I am Rai Adnan, an Android developer and undergraduate. Do you love this app and willing to give support in other to build more useful content? Follow me on Envato

একটি ত্রুটি ঘটেছে, অনুগ্রহ করে আবার চেষ্টা করুন।
অনুগ্রহ করে আপনার ইন্টারনেট সংযোগ পরীক্ষা করুন এবং আবার চেষ্টা করুন।

Copied from Hadith Pro (Download our app from https://github.com/unkn4wn/hadith-pro/releases/tag/Latest)
If you found any error, please email us
We have added Daily Ayah notifications and new Widget with weather information
Contact me on Whatsapp for custom work.

In order to comply with the European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we herby draw your attention to Quran Reader Pro\'s privacy policy. Please read it carefully.\nYou must accept it to send us the bug report.
Sorry, that should not have happened.
Please check whether an issue discussing your crash already exists. When creating duplicate tickets, you take time from us which we could spend with fixing the actual bug.
An open source set of muslim tools, lightweight and ads free
Quran Reader Pro project aims to provide a private, anonymous and ads free experience for all users. Therefore, the app does not collect any data without your consent
In order to calculate prayer timings effectively, this application need your permission to use your location capabilities. (recommended)

We need also your permission to use background location capabilities to update prayer timings even when the app is closed or not used, please select \"allow all the time option\" in the next screen (recommended)
Quran Reader Pro Android introduces great features and capabilities for all users, like : Worldwide Prayer Timings, different calculation methods, notifications, reads Adhan, Qibla direction and more
The application needs to know your location to calculate prayer times correctly. You can set your location manually in the settings screen.
Shia Ithna Ashari, Leva Research Institute, Qum
Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran
L\'Union des Organisations Islamiques de France (UOIF)
Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Russia
Ministry of Religious Affairs and wakfs- Algeria
Ministry of Religious Affairs and wakfs

The application is not allowed to change to \'Do Not Disturb\' state
Your device doesn\'t have the required sensors
Please calibrate your sensors, by pointing your phone up toward the sky and move it in a figure 8 motion
The time for the next prayer is near
Scheduling exact alarm permission was revoked on your phone, without it, you cannot receive any Adhan notification. Please grant this permission to continue using Quran Reader Pro correctly

Cannot update prayer timing : Please check your network connection

Reset all settings to the default.

Alarm permission is required to enable verse reminder.
Free up space by deleting unused downloaded resources. This will not delete any bookmarks or settings.\n\nFollowing resources can be freed up:
%d downloaded translations can be freed up.
%1$d stored recitation files from %2$d reciters can be freed up.
%d downloaded scripts and their fonts can be freed up.
%d saved chapter information can be cleaned up.
%d saved tafsirs can be cleaned up.

All the stored recitation from %s will be deleted. To individually delete recitations by Surah, go to the manage audio settings.

All the saved chapter info will be deleted.
All the stored tafsir from %s will be deleted.
There is nothing to clean up.
Personalize the app in your language. You can always change this later.
You can always change this later.
You can always change this later. You can download more translations from the settings.
You can always change this later. You can find more reciters in the settings.
Add a chapter to favourites to see here.
All recitations of \"%1$s\" for reciter \"%2$s\" will be deleted.
In the Name of Allâh, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful

QuranApp

Best free app to read the Noble Qur'an with translations. This app has nice and clean look and many other features.
